title: Humpty's 2nd Fall Calls For An Artist, Not An Army
teaser: Humpty Dumpty sat on a wall. Humpty Dumpty had a great fall. But at the Enchanted Forest theme park in Salem, Ore., only one man is needed to put him back together again: theme park owner and sculptor of Humpty himself, artist Roger Tofte.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
